name: LicensePlateGame
0:
”Alexa, open license plate game.”
”Alexa, ask license plate game to add Texas.”
”Alexa, ask license plate game to list states.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: license plate game
des:
When you just want to play the license plate game. This skill helps Alexa keep track of the states you and your family have seen on the road. After finding a new state Alexa will show you the state flag in the Alexa App.

This requires a mobile version of Alexa, so it is best for someone in the car (not the driver) to add states via the Alexa App. If you own the Echo Auto you can use this skill hands-free.

Example Phrases:
- Alexa, ask the license plate game to add Massachusetts.
- Alexa, ask the license plate game to list states.
- Alexa, ask the license plate game to tell me our remaining states.
- Alexa, ask the license plate game to remove Texas.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
